description:
A photo of Yuu and Koyuki together spreads like wildfire on Twitter, creating a huge scandal for the popular singer Koyuki. Even Yuu`s account is found and targeted, and wild rumors are even going around at school. The band`s practices in preparation for the school fair had been coming along smoothly, but the rumors spoil Fuuka`s mood. Meanwhile, Koyuki appears on TV and makes a declaration to the whole world...
Source: crunchyroll
